ygData.subject: RE: Bard armor... lambent stones
ygData.msgSnippet: There is a quest for a Darkwood Staff that will require a lambent stone ... From: Jason Rochelle [mailto:Jasroc@home.com] Sent: Wednesday, October 13, 1999
ygData.messageBody:
There is a quest for a Darkwood Staff that will require a lambent stone

-----Original Message-----
From: Jason Rochelle [mailto:Jasroc@...]
Sent: Wednesday, October 13, 1999 3:32 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Bard armor... lambent stones


From: Jason Rochelle <Jasroc@...>

not sure about all the other classes, but shamen do not need lambet
stones for their armor, I had a nice chat with the shaman who gives out
the quest in Lake Rathe, and she only wanted banded and pelts (from DW
goblins in dragnor, and some polar bear in permafrost).

Message: 4
Date: Wed, 13 Oct 1999 09:17:35 -0700
From: Ryan Honeyman <slasher@...>
Subject: Re: Question about bard armor quests

>For example, we need lambent stones for each of the armor
>pieces. Will other classes also need lambent stones for
>their armor quests or are the components they need completely
>different than ours?

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@... with
the subject lol.
